last_episode_to_air.name: Present & Future
last_episode_to_air.overview: Alisha makes a pass at Rishi. Does Rishi give into the temptations? What will Shweta do? Will this mad couple find their mojo back?

name: Married Woman Diaries
overview: Married Woman Diaries is a humorous take on the lives of an urban couple seen through the eyes of a married woman . Her fun, aggressive and passionate take on constantly changing dynamics of a relationship makes this new web series romantic, filled with drama and lots of laughs! Every day a new summit every day a new reason to fall in love. Each new episode showcases an issue the couple deals within their daily life.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Last year we witnessed the first phase of Rishi and Shweta's Marriage. This year, join us in the roller coaster ride as they get on with Phase 2 of their Married life. God has blessed them with a bundle of joy named Bani. But that has left them with no time for themselves or for anything else. All attempts to rekindle the old flame are failing and only an external threat can save their marriage now. We are back with Married Woman Diaries Phase 2, with more Fun, More Masti and even more Madness.
